an8.14:1.1: “Aṭṭha ca, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅke desessāmi aṭṭha ca assadose, aṭṭha ca purisakhaḷuṅke aṭṭha ca purisadose.
an8.14:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an8.14:1.3: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an8.14:2.1: “Katame ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭha assakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca assadosā?
an8.14:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭikkamati, piṭṭhito rathaṁ pavatteti.
an8.14:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchā laṅghati, kubbaraṁ hanati, tidaṇḍaṁ bhañjati.
an8.14:4.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā rathīsāya satthiṁ ussajjitvā rathīsaṁyeva ajjhomaddati.
an8.14:5.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā ummaggaṁ gaṇhati, ubbaṭumaṁ rathaṁ karoti.
an8.14:6.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā laṅghati purimakāyaṁ paggaṇhati purime pāde.
an8.14:7.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā anādiyitvā sārathiṁ anādiyitvā patodalaṭṭhiṁ dantehi mukhādhānaṁ vidhaṁsitvā yena kāmaṁ pakkamati.
an8.14:8.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā neva abhikkamati no paṭikkamati tattheva khīlaṭṭhāyī ṭhito hoti.
an8.14:9.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā purime ca pāde saṁharitvā pacchime ca pāde saṁharitvā tattheva cattāro pāde abhinisīdati.
an8.14:9.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha assakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca assadosā.
an8.14:10.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭha purisakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca purisadosā?
an8.14:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:10.3: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno ‘na sarāmī’ti asatiyā nibbeṭheti.
an8.14:10.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭikkamati, piṭṭhito rathaṁ vatteti;
an8.14:11.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:11.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno codakaṁyeva paṭippharati:
an8.14:11.3: ‘kiṁ nu kho tuyhaṁ bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena.
an8.14:11.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchā laṅghati, kubbaraṁ hanati, tidaṇḍaṁ bhañjati;
an8.14:12.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:12.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno codakasseva paccāropeti:
an8.14:12.3: ‘tvaṁ khosi itthannāmaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno, tvaṁ tāva paṭhamaṁ paṭikarohī’ti.
an8.14:12.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā rathīsāya satthiṁ ussajjitvā rathīsaṁyeva ajjhomaddati;
an8.14:13.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:13.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno aññenāññaṁ paṭicarati, bahiddhā kathaṁ apanāmeti, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an8.14:13.3: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā ummaggaṁ gaṇhati, ubbaṭumaṁ rathaṁ karoti;
an8.14:14.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:14.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno saṅghamajjhe bāhuvikkhepaṁ karoti.
an8.14:14.3: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā laṅghati, purimakāyaṁ paggaṇhati purime pāde;
an8.14:15.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:15.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno anādiyitvā saṅghaṁ anādiyitvā codakaṁ sāpattikova yena kāmaṁ pakkamati.
an8.14:15.3: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā anādiyitvā sārathiṁ anādiyitvā patodalaṭṭhiṁ dantehi mukhādhānaṁ vidhaṁsitvā yena kāmaṁ pakkamati;
an8.14:16.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:16.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno ‘nevāhaṁ āpannomhi, na panāhaṁ āpannomhī’ti so tuṇhībhāvena saṅghaṁ viheṭheti.
an8.14:16.3: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā neva abhikkamati no paṭikkamati tattheva khīlaṭṭhāyī ṭhito hoti;
an8.14:17.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:17.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno evamāha:
an8.14:17.3: ‘kiṁ nu kho tumhe āyasmanto atibāḷhaṁ mayi byāvaṭā yāva idānāhaṁ sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī’ti.
an8.14:17.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅko ‘pehī’ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā purime ca pāde saṁharitvā pacchime ca pāde saṁharitvā tattheva cattāro pāde abhinisīdati;
an8.14:17.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha purisakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca purisadosā”ti.
